correctAnswers.question: In this current pandemic situation, It is difficult to approach students directly to advertise our events. Suggest any three innovative methods to grab the attention of the students and publicize our events.
correctAnswers.answer:
1) Instagram pages. Maybe the most common method but with proper quality and schedule of posts can make a huge difference.

2) YouTube. Uploading YouTube videos of trailers and behind the scenes go a long way in showing students what the event is all about.

3)Discord. I certainly have started using Discord a lot since the start of the lockdown and a dedicated server to the event with proper bots to give notifications and updates will certainly get students' attention.

correctAnswers.question: Being in a team of many members, how would you deal if one of your team members doesn’t want to work with you?
correctAnswers.answer:
Talk to the individual to put the team before personal differences. The team's success should be the ultimate goal.
I'd also be inclusive and try to work with him more, so that arguments may be set aside.
Every team member has individual roles, so if our roles do not coincide, it'll be best to avoid the person.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
There are 2 ways this situation will go-
1) We book another auditorium or do an open venue event. It will be difficult to organise but somehow manageable.

2)We convince the other 2 parties to postpone their event.

To make sure something like this never happens, I will-

1) Keep constant checks on the venue and inquire on a timely basis.

2) Be organised and keep everything ready incase something wrong happens.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: I'd suggest a first cum first serve basis for such a situation.

correctAnswers.question: Why do you think sponsors are crucial for an event. What key factors will you keep in mind to decide whether to approach an organization for sponsorships or not?
correctAnswers.answer:
Sponsors are crucial for an event as they give us the necessary funding to execute the event smoothly.
The key factors to look in mind while looking for a sponsor is-
1) They should set their terms clearly. Sponsors that change their terms indecisively are a huge hassle.
2) Their goals should coincide with the key outcomes of the event.

correctAnswers.answer: I'll get a speaker from company B. While bringing a speaker from company A might help us get more traction to the event, the speaker from company B will have more innovative and motivational ideas to share.

It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer: firstly I will go to the person who gave us the auditorium and tell how could he do this then as it was his fault and there is no other option that guy who gives the auditorium , me , and the other person whos event was colliding with me would work as fast as possible to find one more auditorium. To prevent this before the main event a day before and also a week before there should be certain reminder or would like to cross check if there is some collision or some fault so that nothing could go wrong

correctAnswers.answer: Then I would like to do it in a certain batch. For eg. there are 2000 registrations and it exceeded by 500. so i would like to do it in 4 batches 10-12 first 500, 12-2 500-1000 and so on. In this way smoothly event can be conducted.

correctAnswers.question: What motivated you to apply for IETE's editorial team?

correctAnswers.question: Being in a team of many members, how would you deal if one of your team members doesn’t want to work with you?

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
First of all, I will discuss with the other event's coordinator whether they plan to postpone their event. I would convince their team that our event is a really big one with many important guests in it. If no positive result takes place9which should be highly unlikely), I would try to look for other venues where our event can take place smoothly.
To prevent something like this in the future, I(along with my team) would be fully prepared with our event planning in a day or two in advance and notify the same to Clubs & Chapters Committee.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: If possible we would arrange for more seats, chairs, etc. If not, we'll email the leftover registrations about the issue and kindly apologize for the same. We could even email the recording of the event to everyone who couldn't attend the event.

correctAnswers.question:
Company A: Well established, very famous.
Company B: A new start-up which is growing rapidly
All this while for our major events, we have been getting speakers from company A, but this we get a chance to invite a speaker from company B. From which company would you get the speaker? Why?
correctAnswers.answer: I would firstly require sample speakers from company B at least a week before the event to test the sound quality and technical glitches (if any) in them with our team. If their speaker meets our expectations and charges lesser money than company A, we can tie up with B for our future events.

correctAnswers.question: What are the ways in which you can publicize the sponsors product/service (if any) in online or offline mode?
correctAnswers.answer: We can add their product/service on our social media handle or add in our social media posts either in the design or caption. We can also mention and thank them at various intervals of the event.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer: If such situation happens first i will try to talk to other event head and try to come to a possible midway by dividing time slots or requesting them to postpone their event if possible. If it does not work then i will try to find some other place by the money compensated by auditorium. To avoid these kind of situations i would before hand ask for a conformation reciept and personally talk to manager of auditorium to check for any such possibilities.

correctAnswers.question: How will you prioritize work between chapter’s urgent work and a paper due tomorrow?
correctAnswers.answer: I would prioritise my main work of exams to an extent so that I can get a respectable marks in it and then prioritise the work of my chapter's urgent work.

correctAnswers.question: You are the coordinator for an event. The speaker has backed off at the last moment, due to a medical emergency. 100+ participants are waiting for him to arrive. How will you handle the situation?
correctAnswers.answer: If a situation like this happens then I would see if I have any contact of an alternate speaker with me otherwise I would handle the situation with an alternate lecture in which my team is good at.

correctAnswers.question: If you are a part of more than one club/chapter, and are having multiple meetings at the same time.What would you do in such a situation?
correctAnswers.answer: I would attend the meeting of the chapter of whose work I am more enthusiastic about and ask my friend in the other chapters for some notes of the meeting in the other ones.

correctAnswers.question: You along with 2 other members are given the duty to conduct a workshop. The other 2 members and you do not agree on some point. What will you do in this situation?
correctAnswers.answer: I would talk to the other person and come to a compromise on that points.

correctAnswers.question: Being in a team of many members, how would you deal if one of your team members doesn’t want to work with you?
correctAnswers.answer: If a team member is not willing to work with me , firstly I will try to find out the reason why. Then if we can talk out any problems among us that would be best. Else if with some of my compromises the team benefits, I will be ready to do so. Else, I will try to find someone else who can do his/her part of the job and is willing to work with me.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Firstly, to avoid such situations, I will be keeping in touch with the auditorium authorities, reminding them about our event and telling them to arrange everything nicely. Also, I will keep a backup auditorium in my sight .
2.In such situation , I will look what was the confusion that led to the situation. I will ask the auditorium authorities to allot us the auditorium as we had booked it first. I will ask the other party to look for auditorium somewhere else as we had booked it first. By the time I am doing all this, I will ask my colleagues to look for somewhere else where we can conduct our program.
If nothing happens , I will postpone the program, or will try to conduct it online.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will try to make the program offline cum online, so that the extra ones are accommodated in the online platform. Else, I will try to accommodate them in the same place by adding extra chairs. Else, I will cancel the registration of the extra participants at that time, and arrange another program for them with new registrations, where there will be a cap on registering participants.

correctAnswers.question: Why do you think sponsors are crucial for an event. What key factors will you keep in mind to decide whether to approach an organization for sponsorships or not?
correctAnswers.answer:
Sponsors are crucial for a program as without money, no program can be organised.
The key factor will be whether the sponsor has enough resources to sponsor our program and whether the topic of program resonates with sponsor not.

correctAnswers.question:
Company A: Well established, very famous.
Company B: A new start-up which is growing rapidly
All this while for our major events, we have been getting speakers from company A, but this we get a chance to invite a speaker from company B. From which company would you get the speaker? Why?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to the speaker from company B, because being a part of a growing startup , he will know the difficulties faced to run a company among the top players, he will be able to guide the audience better on how to deal with difficult situation, and how to grow more among the top players starting from raw.

correctAnswers.answer: I would like to choose a creative idea for an event, as it will be unique, different from others.

correctAnswers.question: Being in a team of many members, how would you deal if one of your team members doesn’t want to work with you?
correctAnswers.answer: If a team member is not willing to work with me , firstly I will try to find out the reason why. Then if we can talk out any problems among us that would be best. Else if with some of my compromises the team benefits, I will be ready to do so. Else, I will try to find someone else who can do his/her part of the job and is willing to work with me.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Firstly, to avoid such situations, I will be keeping in touch with the auditorium authorities, reminding them about our event and telling them to arrange everything nicely. Also, I will keep a backup auditorium in my sight .
2.In such situation , I will look what was the confusion that led to the situation. I will ask the auditorium authorities to allot us the auditorium as we had booked it first. I will ask the other party to look for auditorium somewhere else as we had booked it first. By the time I am doing all this, I will ask my colleagues to look for somewhere else where we can conduct our program.
If nothing happens , I will postpone the program, or will try to conduct it online.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will try to make the program offline cum online, so that the extra ones are accommodated in the online platform. Else, I will try to accommodate them in the same place by adding extra chairs. Else, I will cancel the registration of the extra participants at that time, and arrange another program for them with new registrations, where there will be a cap on registering participants.

correctAnswers.question: Why do you think sponsors are crucial for an event. What key factors will you keep in mind to decide whether to approach an organization for sponsorships or not?
correctAnswers.answer:
Sponsors are crucial for a program as without money, no program can be organised.
The key factor will be whether the sponsor has enough resources to sponsor our program and whether the topic of program resonates with sponsor not.

correctAnswers.question:
Company A: Well established, very famous.
Company B: A new start-up which is growing rapidly
All this while for our major events, we have been getting speakers from company A, but this we get a chance to invite a speaker from company B. From which company would you get the speaker? Why?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to the speaker from company B, because being a part of a growing startup , he will know the difficulties faced to run a company among the top players, he will be able to guide the audience better on how to deal with difficult situation, and how to grow more among the top players starting from raw.

correctAnswers.question: Is it necessary to come up with an unique or creative idea to organize an event or would you choose to follow a standard procedure of going about it?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to choose a creative idea for an event, as it will be unique, different from others.

correctAnswers.question: What are the ways in which you can publicize the sponsors product/service (if any) in online or offline mode?
correctAnswers.answer: To publicise the sponsors, we can give goodies to the participants with the logo of the sponsors. Using posters of sponsors where the event is conducted. Mentioning them in between the event from time to time.

correctAnswers.question: How will you prioritize work between chapter’s urgent work and a paper due tomorrow?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will prepare for my paper beforehand throughout the semester , to give time tol the chapter's work.

correctAnswers.question: You are the coordinator for an event. The speaker has backed off at the last moment, due to a medical emergency. 100+ participants are waiting for him to arrive. How will you handle the situation?
correctAnswers.answer: I will ask some people from audience to put forward their views and will use internet resources to conduct the program.

correctAnswers.question: In this current pandemic situation, It is difficult to approach students directly to advertise our events. Suggest any three innovative methods to grab the attention of the students and publicize our events.
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Use social media, popular social media pages to publicise the club.
2. Conduct small and interesting competitions on social media with prizes.
3. Help the students in these times with motivation and study material circulated through social media.

correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will prepare for my paper beforehand throughout the semester , to give time tol the chapter's work.

correctAnswers.question: You are the coordinator for an event. The speaker has backed off at the last moment, due to a medical emergency. 100+ participants are waiting for him to arrive. How will you handle the situation?
correctAnswers.answer: I will ask some people from audience to put forward their views and will use internet resources to conduct the program.

correctAnswers.question: In this current pandemic situation, It is difficult to approach students directly to advertise our events. Suggest any three innovative methods to grab the attention of the students and publicize our events.
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Use social media, popular social media pages to publicise the club.
2. Conduct small and interesting competitions on social media with prizes.
3. Help the students in these times with motivation and study material circulated through social media.

correctAnswers.question: Being in a team of many members, how would you deal if one of your team members doesn’t want to work with you?
correctAnswers.answer: If a team member is not willing to work with me , firstly I will try to find out the reason why. Then if we can talk out any problems among us that would be best. Else if with some of my compromises the team benefits, I will be ready to do so. Else, I will try to find someone else who can do his/her part of the job and is willing to work with me.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Firstly, to avoid such situations, I will be keeping in touch with the auditorium authorities, reminding them about our event and telling them to arrange everything nicely. Also, I will keep a backup auditorium in my sight .
2.In such situation , I will look what was the confusion that led to the situation. I will ask the auditorium authorities to allot us the auditorium as we had booked it first. I will ask the other party to look for auditorium somewhere else as we had booked it first. By the time I am doing all this, I will ask my colleagues to look for somewhere else where we can conduct our program.
If nothing happens , I will postpone the program, or will try to conduct it online.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will try to make the program offline cum online, so that the extra ones are accommodated in the online platform. Else, I will try to accommodate them in the same place by adding extra chairs. Else, I will cancel the registration of the extra participants at that time, and arrange another program for them with new registrations, where there will be a cap on registering participants.

correctAnswers.question: Why do you think sponsors are crucial for an event. What key factors will you keep in mind to decide whether to approach an organization for sponsorships or not?
correctAnswers.answer:
Sponsors are crucial for a program as without money, no program can be organised.
The key factor will be whether the sponsor has enough resources to sponsor our program and whether the topic of program resonates with sponsor not.

correctAnswers.question:
Company A: Well established, very famous.
Company B: A new start-up which is growing rapidly
All this while for our major events, we have been getting speakers from company A, but this we get a chance to invite a speaker from company B. From which company would you get the speaker? Why?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to the speaker from company B, because being a part of a growing startup , he will know the difficulties faced to run a company among the top players, he will be able to guide the audience better on how to deal with difficult situation, and how to grow more among the top players starting from raw.

correctAnswers.question: Is it necessary to come up with an unique or creative idea to organize an event or would you choose to follow a standard procedure of going about it?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to choose a creative idea for an event, as it will be unique, different from others.

The key factor will be whether the sponsor has enough resources to sponsor our program and whether the topic of program resonates with sponsor not.

correctAnswers.question:
Company A: Well established, very famous.
Company B: A new start-up which is growing rapidly
All this while for our major events, we have been getting speakers from company A, but this we get a chance to invite a speaker from company B. From which company would you get the speaker? Why?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to the speaker from company B, because being a part of a growing startup , he will know the difficulties faced to run a company among the top players, he will be able to guide the audience better on how to deal with difficult situation, and how to grow more among the top players starting from raw.

correctAnswers.question: Is it necessary to come up with an unique or creative idea to organize an event or would you choose to follow a standard procedure of going about it?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to choose a creative idea for an event, as it will be unique, different from others.

correctAnswers.question: What are the ways in which you can publicize the sponsors product/service (if any) in online or offline mode?
correctAnswers.answer: To publicise the sponsors, we can give goodies to the participants with the logo of the sponsors. Using posters of sponsors where the event is conducted. Mentioning them in between the event from time to time.

correctAnswers.question: How will you prioritize work between chapter’s urgent work and a paper due tomorrow?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will prepare for my paper beforehand throughout the semester , to give time tol the chapter's work.

correctAnswers.question: You are the coordinator for an event. The speaker has backed off at the last moment, due to a medical emergency. 100+ participants are waiting for him to arrive. How will you handle the situation?
correctAnswers.answer: I will ask some people from audience to put forward their views and will use internet resources to conduct the program.

correctAnswers.question: In this current pandemic situation, It is difficult to approach students directly to advertise our events. Suggest any three innovative methods to grab the attention of the students and publicize our events.
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Use social media, popular social media pages to publicise the club.
2. Conduct small and interesting competitions on social media with prizes.
3. Help the students in these times with motivation and study material circulated through social media.

correctAnswers.question: Being in a team of many members, how would you deal if one of your team members doesn’t want to work with you?
correctAnswers.answer: If a team member is not willing to work with me , firstly I will try to find out the reason why. Then if we can talk out any problems among us that would be best. Else if with some of my compromises the team benefits, I will be ready to do so. Else, I will try to find someone else who can do his/her part of the job and is willing to work with me.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Firstly, to avoid such situations, I will be keeping in touch with the auditorium authorities, reminding them about our event and telling them to arrange everything nicely. Also, I will keep a backup auditorium in my sight .
2.In such situation , I will look what was the confusion that led to the situation. I will ask the auditorium authorities to allot us the auditorium as we had booked it first. I will ask the other party to look for auditorium somewhere else as we had booked it first. By the time I am doing all this, I will ask my colleagues to look for somewhere else where we can conduct our program.
If nothing happens , I will postpone the program, or will try to conduct it online.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will try to make the program offline cum online, so that the extra ones are accommodated in the online platform. Else, I will try to accommodate them in the same place by adding extra chairs. Else, I will cancel the registration of the extra participants at that time, and arrange another program for them with new registrations, where there will be a cap on registering participants.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will try to make the program offline cum online, so that the extra ones are accommodated in the online platform. Else, I will try to accommodate them in the same place by adding extra chairs. Else, I will cancel the registration of the extra participants at that time, and arrange another program for them with new registrations, where there will be a cap on registering participants.

correctAnswers.question: Why do you think sponsors are crucial for an event. What key factors will you keep in mind to decide whether to approach an organization for sponsorships or not?
correctAnswers.answer:
Sponsors are crucial for a program as without money, no program can be organised.
The key factor will be whether the sponsor has enough resources to sponsor our program and whether the topic of program resonates with sponsor not.

correctAnswers.question:
Company A: Well established, very famous.
Company B: A new start-up which is growing rapidly
All this while for our major events, we have been getting speakers from company A, but this we get a chance to invite a speaker from company B. From which company would you get the speaker? Why?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to the speaker from company B, because being a part of a growing startup , he will know the difficulties faced to run a company among the top players, he will be able to guide the audience better on how to deal with difficult situation, and how to grow more among the top players starting from raw.

correctAnswers.question: Is it necessary to come up with an unique or creative idea to organize an event or would you choose to follow a standard procedure of going about it?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to choose a creative idea for an event, as it will be unique, different from others.

correctAnswers.question: What are the ways in which you can publicize the sponsors product/service (if any) in online or offline mode?
correctAnswers.answer: To publicise the sponsors, we can give goodies to the participants with the logo of the sponsors. Using posters of sponsors where the event is conducted. Mentioning them in between the event from time to time.

correctAnswers.question: How will you prioritize work between chapter’s urgent work and a paper due tomorrow?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will prepare for my paper beforehand throughout the semester , to give time tol the chapter's work.

correctAnswers.question: You are the coordinator for an event. The speaker has backed off at the last moment, due to a medical emergency. 100+ participants are waiting for him to arrive. How will you handle the situation?
correctAnswers.answer: I will ask some people from audience to put forward their views and will use internet resources to conduct the program.

correctAnswers.question: In this current pandemic situation, It is difficult to approach students directly to advertise our events. Suggest any three innovative methods to grab the attention of the students and publicize our events.
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Use social media, popular social media pages to publicise the club.

3. Help the students in these times with motivation and study material circulated through social media.

correctAnswers.question: Being in a team of many members, how would you deal if one of your team members doesn’t want to work with you?
correctAnswers.answer: If a team member is not willing to work with me , firstly I will try to find out the reason why. Then if we can talk out any problems among us that would be best. Else if with some of my compromises the team benefits, I will be ready to do so. Else, I will try to find someone else who can do his/her part of the job and is willing to work with me.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Firstly, to avoid such situations, I will be keeping in touch with the auditorium authorities, reminding them about our event and telling them to arrange everything nicely. Also, I will keep a backup auditorium in my sight .
2.In such situation , I will look what was the confusion that led to the situation. I will ask the auditorium authorities to allot us the auditorium as we had booked it first. I will ask the other party to look for auditorium somewhere else as we had booked it first. By the time I am doing all this, I will ask my colleagues to look for somewhere else where we can conduct our program.
If nothing happens , I will postpone the program, or will try to conduct it online.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Firstly, to avoid such situations, I will be keeping in touch with the auditorium authorities, reminding them about our event and telling them to arrange everything nicely. Also, I will keep a backup auditorium in my sight .
2.In such situation , I will look what was the confusion that led to the situation. I will ask the auditorium authorities to allot us the auditorium as we had booked it first. I will ask the other party to look for auditorium somewhere else as we had booked it first. By the time I am doing all this, I will ask my colleagues to look for somewhere else where we can conduct our program.
If nothing happens , I will postpone the program, or will try to conduct it online.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will try to make the program offline cum online, so that the extra ones are accommodated in the online platform. Else, I will try to accommodate them in the same place by adding extra chairs. Else, I will cancel the registration of the extra participants at that time, and arrange another program for them with new registrations, where there will be a cap on registering participants.

correctAnswers.question: Why do you think sponsors are crucial for an event. What key factors will you keep in mind to decide whether to approach an organization for sponsorships or not?
correctAnswers.answer:
Sponsors are crucial for a program as without money, no program can be organised.
The key factor will be whether the sponsor has enough resources to sponsor our program and whether the topic of program resonates with sponsor not.

correctAnswers.question:
Company A: Well established, very famous.
Company B: A new start-up which is growing rapidly
All this while for our major events, we have been getting speakers from company A, but this we get a chance to invite a speaker from company B. From which company would you get the speaker? Why?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to the speaker from company B, because being a part of a growing startup , he will know the difficulties faced to run a company among the top players, he will be able to guide the audience better on how to deal with difficult situation, and how to grow more among the top players starting from raw.

correctAnswers.question: Is it necessary to come up with an unique or creative idea to organize an event or would you choose to follow a standard procedure of going about it?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to choose a creative idea for an event, as it will be unique, different from others.

correctAnswers.question: What are the ways in which you can publicize the sponsors product/service (if any) in online or offline mode?
correctAnswers.answer: To publicise the sponsors, we can give goodies to the participants with the logo of the sponsors. Using posters of sponsors where the event is conducted. Mentioning them in between the event from time to time.

correctAnswers.question: How will you prioritize work between chapter’s urgent work and a paper due tomorrow?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will prepare for my paper beforehand throughout the semester , to give time tol the chapter's work.

correctAnswers.question: You are the coordinator for an event. The speaker has backed off at the last moment, due to a medical emergency. 100+ participants are waiting for him to arrive. How will you handle the situation?
correctAnswers.answer: I will ask some people from audience to put forward their views and will use internet resources to conduct the program.

correctAnswers.question: You are the coordinator for an event. The speaker has backed off at the last moment, due to a medical emergency. 100+ participants are waiting for him to arrive. How will you handle the situation?
correctAnswers.answer: I will ask some people from audience to put forward their views and will use internet resources to conduct the program.

correctAnswers.question: In this current pandemic situation, It is difficult to approach students directly to advertise our events. Suggest any three innovative methods to grab the attention of the students and publicize our events.
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Use social media, popular social media pages to publicise the club.
2. Conduct small and interesting competitions on social media with prizes.
3. Help the students in these times with motivation and study material circulated through social media.

correctAnswers.question: Being in a team of many members, how would you deal if one of your team members doesn’t want to work with you?
correctAnswers.answer: If a team member is not willing to work with me , firstly I will try to find out the reason why. Then if we can talk out any problems among us that would be best. Else if with some of my compromises the team benefits, I will be ready to do so. Else, I will try to find someone else who can do his/her part of the job and is willing to work with me.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Firstly, to avoid such situations, I will be keeping in touch with the auditorium authorities, reminding them about our event and telling them to arrange everything nicely. Also, I will keep a backup auditorium in my sight .
2.In such situation , I will look what was the confusion that led to the situation. I will ask the auditorium authorities to allot us the auditorium as we had booked it first. I will ask the other party to look for auditorium somewhere else as we had booked it first. By the time I am doing all this, I will ask my colleagues to look for somewhere else where we can conduct our program.
If nothing happens , I will postpone the program, or will try to conduct it online.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will try to make the program offline cum online, so that the extra ones are accommodated in the online platform. Else, I will try to accommodate them in the same place by adding extra chairs. Else, I will cancel the registration of the extra participants at that time, and arrange another program for them with new registrations, where there will be a cap on registering participants.

correctAnswers.question: Why do you think sponsors are crucial for an event. What key factors will you keep in mind to decide whether to approach an organization for sponsorships or not?
correctAnswers.answer:
Sponsors are crucial for a program as without money, no program can be organised.
The key factor will be whether the sponsor has enough resources to sponsor our program and whether the topic of program resonates with sponsor not.

correctAnswers.question:
Company A: Well established, very famous.
Company B: A new start-up which is growing rapidly
All this while for our major events, we have been getting speakers from company A, but this we get a chance to invite a speaker from company B. From which company would you get the speaker? Why?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to the speaker from company B, because being a part of a growing startup , he will know the difficulties faced to run a company among the top players, he will be able to guide the audience better on how to deal with difficult situation, and how to grow more among the top players starting from raw.

correctAnswers.question: Is it necessary to come up with an unique or creative idea to organize an event or would you choose to follow a standard procedure of going about it?
correctAnswers.answer: I would like to choose a creative idea for an event, as it will be unique, different from others.

correctAnswers.question: What are the ways in which you can publicize the sponsors product/service (if any) in online or offline mode?
correctAnswers.answer: To publicise the sponsors, we can give goodies to the participants with the logo of the sponsors. Using posters of sponsors where the event is conducted. Mentioning them in between the event from time to time.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
1. Firstly, to avoid such situations, I will be keeping in touch with the auditorium authorities, reminding them about our event and telling them to arrange everything nicely. Also, I will keep a backup auditorium in my sight .
2.In such situation , I will look what was the confusion that led to the situation. I will ask the auditorium authorities to allot us the auditorium as we had booked it first. I will ask the other party to look for auditorium somewhere else as we had booked it first. By the time I am doing all this, I will ask my colleagues to look for somewhere else where we can conduct our program.
If nothing happens , I will postpone the program, or will try to conduct it online.

correctAnswers.question: Suppose you are managing an offline event and the number of registrations exceeds the capacity of the assigned venue. How do you plan on smoothly conducting the event in such a case?
correctAnswers.answer: Firstly, I will try to make the program offline cum online, so that the extra ones are accommodated in the online platform. Else, I will try to accommodate them in the same place by adding extra chairs. Else, I will cancel the registration of the extra participants at that time, and arrange another program for them with new registrations, where there will be a cap on registering participants.

correctAnswers.question: What motivates you to write?
correctAnswers.answer:
I love to express my thoughts on a particular matter or subject and see how others react to it, whether they resonate with my line of thought or how different their opinion is.

personally speaking, i'm not much of a good speaker.

correctAnswers.question: Write 50 words on any technological advancement in the 21st century.
correctAnswers.answer:
When I think of technological advancements in the recent times, the most prominent revolution that first strikes my mind  is of the cellphone/smartphone domain.
Do you recall how phones were just a means to have a voice call with a distant dear one? when no one bothered about the weight, the size, the look, the speed etc. etc? Look how far the industry has come. Now a smartphone(as we call it now) lives up to its name for being smart, now it's not just a calling device, it is your substitute to your computer, calculator, television, radio, camera etc. Now the specs of the device matters, its speed, its RAM, its display all are now a determining factor when you go on to buy one for yourself.
THIS IS THE DRAMATIC REVOLUTION, AND THIS SURELY IS THE FUTURE.

correctAnswers.question: In this current pandemic situation, It is difficult to approach students directly to advertise our events. Suggest any three innovative methods to grab the attention of the students and publicize our events.
correctAnswers.answer:
1. By indulging the members of the chapters to spread the good word about our chapter in their respective class groups, by telling the advantages of the events.
2. Interacting with the students on all social media and solving all their queries  regarding the event, making them feel comfortable with the chapter and hence building their trust.

correctAnswers.question: Being in a team of many members, how would you deal if one of your team members doesn’t want to work with you?
correctAnswers.answer:
Firstly, I would ask them about why aren't they willing to co-ordinate or work. After finding the root cause i would look for possible solution which is acceptable by the whole team with certain small compromises on everyone's part.
The basic motive is to find a middle ground of all the demands and problems as we have to look for the entire team and not only for an individual.

correctAnswers.question: Imagine you are appointed as the event coordinator for a particular event. This is a really big event with many important people attending it, so you have booked the auditorium for the particular day and have everything sorted out. But on the morning of the event you come to know that there was some confusion and the auditorium has been assigned to two different events on the same day. It is 8:00 in the morning and your event starts at 9:30 am. How will you handle this situation? Also what necessary steps will you take beforehand to make sure something like this never happens?
correctAnswers.answer:
Firstly, I would immediately meet up with the other event coordinators and without discussing why the confusion arose, my priority would be how to deal with this now.
one possible solution that comes to my mind is to discuss the duration of their events and at what time have they organized their event to be conducted. And whether or not can they compromise on that time , like rescheduling it to a later time on the same day. As my event is almost within 2 hours and it would be too late to reschedule it. 
Even trimming down the length of the event could be used as a last resort.
we would put up a display board outside the event room/hall. About the rescheduled timing of the events with an apology for the inconvenience caused.

I believe the cause for this confusion would have been caused by the person/committee responsible for assigning the hall to the clubs/chapters. For it to be never repeated again i would advise them to make a proper record of which team has been assigned which hall/room and should re-check with them atleast 2 days before the e

correctAnswers.question: Write about an accomplishment you are most proud of in 30 words.
correctAnswers.answer: Making my parents proud is the biggest accomplishment according to me. No matter how much you achieve, if they are happy, your achievement is worth it. I made them proud during the board and JEE results and that gives me utmost satisfaction!
